command.name: moveTo
command.summary: Shifts the pen to specified x and y coordinates.

command.name: drawTo
command.summary: Sketches a line from current to specified location.
command.param: End point x-coordinate for the line.
End point y-coordinate for the line.

command.name: clear
command.summary: Erases all current drawings from the canvas.

command.name: rectangle
command.summary: Sketches a rectangle at the pen's current position.

command.name: circle
command.summary: Draws a circle centered at the current pen location.

command.name: triangle
command.summary: Depicts a triangle using three corner points.

command.name: color
command.summary: Alters the pen's color to the chosen one.

command.name: reset
command.summary: Resets the pen's position to the starting point.

command.name: fill
command.summary: Activates or deactivates shape filling mode.
